title: 请问怎么把一个世界设定为不生怪？
author: 气节与德操

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
气节与德操 发表于 2014-8-30 11:05
我输入后依然没有：No game rule called daMobSpawnng is available/gamerule doMobSpawning false复制代码
你那个拼错了。

replies.author: BensonQC
replies.txt_content:
输入命令：
/gamerule  doMobSpawning false复制代码

replies.author: 气节与德操
replies.txt_content:
